content: this legal case involves a dispute over common property inheritance and the awarding of damages and compensation the court ordered the defendant to pay 3500 euros after 1 year and 4 months a compromise was reached between the parties ending the proceedings the court ordered the sale of an apartment at a public auction with the funds divided between the parties the car and trailer will remain with one party who will compensate the other party financial resources will be divided equally the court also divided funds in bank accounts both parties agreed to waive claims regarding ownership of an apartment each party will pay their own legal costs the court granted the defendants request for a refund of the state fee the court order was delivered to both parties and an appeal was filed the lawsuit was filed by one party regarding the division of common property inheritance and compensation a compromise was submitted to the court which was approved and ended the proceedings the courts decision was based on the code of civil procedure the compromise agreement replaces the need for notarization and cannot be appealed by the claimant procedural costs will be borne by the parties with the defendant receiving a refund of the state fee the court processed a counterclaim and determined that a compromise should be submitted resulting in a refund of the state fee
